channel.title: [PI] Yo-yo
channel.description:
Hello, I would like to release yoyos on my server to the players. I have about 10 players now, I gave out some santa hats, and said I would try to work on yoyos.
So basically, I've never done anything like this before..
The item id is 4079
the emotes for the yoyo are as follows:
1457 - normal yoyo 1458 - spin - yo-yo 1459 - walk yo-yo emote 1460 - crazy yo-yo
How can I make it so when I click on the different options of the yoyo, it performs that emote?
I thought I could just find the actionbutton of the yoyo, but it wasn't coming up.
Any help is appreciated.
Thanks in advanced, Tyler.

item.title: [PI] Yo-yo
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Yeah That’s what I did, two of the options work now.

item.title: [PI] Yo-yo
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Hello, I would like to release yoyos on my server to the players. I have about 10 players now, I gave out some santa hats, and said I would try to work on yoyos.

So basically, I’ve never done anything like this before…

The item id is 4079

the emotes for the yoyo are as follows:

1457 - normal yoyo
1458 - spin - yo-yo
1459 - walk yo-yo emote
1460 - crazy yo-yo

How can I make it so when I click on the different options of the yoyo, it performs that emote?

I thought I could just find the actionbutton of the yoyo, but it wasn’t coming up.

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks in advanced, Tyler.

Read full topic
